name: Zamazenta

ability.name: Guardian
ability.effect: While Zamazenta is your Active Pokemon, your Benched Pokemon are immune to effects and damage. Zamazenta takes 30 less damage from attacks, minus 10 for each time the attacker has evolved.

attacks.name: Protective Paw
attacks.effect: Draw a card. If you have 3 Basic Pokemon on your Bench, draw another card.

flavor: This dog is fiercely protective. Its fur is harder than steel.
